verses.verse: Therefore <S%G3767><s%> be imitators <S%G3402><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> as beloved <S%G27><s%> children; <S%G5043><s%>

and walk <S%G4043><s%> in love, <S%G26><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as Christ <S%G5547><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> you, and gave <S%G3860><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> up for us, an offering <S%G4376><s%> and a sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> as a fragrant <S%G2175><s%> aroma. <S%G3744><s%>

But do not let immorality <S%G4202><s%> or <S%G2532><s%> any <S%G3956><s%> impurity <S%G167><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> greed <S%G4124><s%> even <S%G3366><s%> be named <S%G3687><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, as is proper <S%G4241><s%> among saints; <S%G40><s%>

and [there must be no] filthiness <S%G151><s%> and silly <S%G3473><s%> talk, <S%G3473><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> coarse <S%G2160><s%> jesting, <S%G2160><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> are not fitting, <S%G433><s%> but rather <S%G3123><s%> giving <S%G2169><s%> of thanks. <S%G2169><s%>

For this <S%G3778><s%> you know <S%G3609><s%> with certainty, <S%G1097><s%> that no <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3956><s%> immoral <S%G4205><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> impure <S%G169><s%> person <S%G169><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> covetous <S%G4123><s%> man, <S%G4123><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is an idolater, <S%G1496><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> an inheritance <S%G2817><s%> in the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> and God. <S%G2316><s%>

Let no <S%G3367><s%> one <S%G3367><s%> deceive <S%G538><s%> you with empty <S%G2756><s%> words, <S%G3056><s%> for because <S%G1223><s%> of these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> the wrath <S%G3709><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> upon the sons <S%G5207><s%> of disobedience. <S%G543><s%>
Therefore <S%G3767><s%> do not be partakers <S%G4830><s%> with them;

for you were formerly <S%G4218><s%> darkness, <S%G4655><s%> but now <S%G3568><s%> you are light <S%G5457><s%> in the Lord; <S%G2962><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> as children <S%G5043><s%> of light <S%G5457><s%>
(for the fruit <S%G2590><s%> of the light <S%G5457><s%> [consists] in all <S%G3956><s%> goodness <S%G19><s%> and righteousness <S%G1343><s%> and truth <S%G225><s%>),
trying <S%G1381><s%> to learn <S%G1381><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is pleasing <S%G2101><s%> to the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
And do not participate <S%G4790><s%> in the unfruitful <S%G175><s%> deeds <S%G2041><s%> of darkness, <S%G4655><s%> but instead <S%G3123><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> expose <S%G1651><s%> them;
for it is disgraceful <S%G150><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> to speak <S%G3004><s%> of the things which are done <S%G1096><s%> by them in secret. <S%G2931><s%>

But all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> become <S%G5319><s%> visible <S%G5319><s%> when they are exposed <S%G1651><s%> by the light, <S%G5457><s%> for everything <S%G3956><s%> that becomes <S%G5319><s%> visible <S%G5319><s%> is light. <S%G5457><s%>

For this <S%G1352><s%> reason <S%G1352><s%> it says, <S%G3004><s%> "Awake, <S%G1453><s%> sleeper, <S%G2518><s%> And arise <S%G450><s%> from the dead, <S%G3498><s%> And Christ <S%G5547><s%> will shine <S%G2017><s%> on you."
Therefore <S%G3767><s%> be careful <S%G991><s%> <S%G199><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> you walk, <S%G4043><s%> not as unwise <S%G781><s%> men, <S%G781><s%> but as wise, <S%G4680><s%>
making <S%G1805><s%> the most <S%G1805><s%> of your time, <S%G2540><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> are evil. <S%G4190><s%>
So <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3778><s%> then <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3778><s%> do not be foolish, <S%G878><s%> but understand <S%G4920><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is.
And do not get <S%G3182><s%> drunk <S%G3182><s%> with wine, <S%G3631><s%> for that is dissipation, <S%G810><s%> but be filled <S%G4137><s%> with the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%>

speaking <S%G2980><s%> to one <S%G1438><s%> another <S%G1438><s%> in psalms <S%G5568><s%> and hymns <S%G5215><s%> and spiritual <S%G4152><s%> songs, <S%G5603><s%> singing <S%G103><s%> and making <S%G5567><s%> melody <S%G5567><s%> with your heart <S%G2588><s%> to the Lord; <S%G2962><s%>

always <S%G3842><s%> giving <S%G2168><s%> thanks <S%G2168><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the Father; <S%G3962><s%>
and be subject <S%G5293><s%> to one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> in the fear <S%G5401><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
Wives, <S%G1135><s%> [be subject] to your own <S%G2398><s%> husbands, <S%G435><s%> as to the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

For the husband <S%G435><s%> is the head <S%G2776><s%> of the wife, <S%G1135><s%> as Christ <S%G5547><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> is the head <S%G2776><s%> of the church, <S%G1577><s%> He Himself <S%G846><s%> [being] the Savior <S%G4990><s%> of the body. <S%G4983><s%>

But as the church <S%G1577><s%> is subject <S%G5293><s%> to Christ, <S%G5547><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the wives <S%G1135><s%> [ought to be] to their husbands <S%G435><s%> in everything. <S%G3956><s%>

Husbands, <S%G435><s%> love <S%G25><s%> your wives, <S%G1135><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as Christ <S%G5547><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%> and gave <S%G3860><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> up for her;
that He might sanctify <S%G37><s%> her, having cleansed <S%G2511><s%> her by the washing <S%G3067><s%> of water <S%G5204><s%> with the word, <S%G4487><s%>

that He might present <S%G3936><s%> to Himself <S%G1438><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%> in all <S%G1741><s%> her glory, <S%G1741><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> spot <S%G4696><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> wrinkle <S%G4512><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> thing; <S%G5108><s%> but that she should be holy <S%G40><s%> and blameless. <S%G299><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> husbands <S%G435><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to love <S%G25><s%> their own <S%G1438><s%> wives <S%G1135><s%> as their own <S%G1438><s%> bodies. <S%G4983><s%> He who loves <S%G25><s%> his own <S%G1438><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> loves <S%G25><s%> himself; <S%G1438><s%>

for no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> ever <S%G4218><s%> hated <S%G3404><s%> his own <S%G1438><s%> flesh, <S%G4561><s%> but nourishes <S%G1625><s%> and cherishes <S%G2282><s%> it, just <S%G2531><s%> as Christ <S%G5547><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> [does] the church, <S%G1577><s%>
because <S%G3754><s%> we are members <S%G3196><s%> of His body. <S%G4983><s%>

For this <S%G3778><s%> cause <S%G473><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> shall leave <S%G2641><s%> his father <S%G3962><s%> and mother, <S%G3384><s%> and shall cleave <S%G4347><s%> to his wife; <S%G1135><s%> and the two <S%G1417><s%> shall become <S%G1510><s%> <S%G1519><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> flesh. <S%G4561><s%>
This <S%G3778><s%> mystery <S%G3466><s%> is great; <S%G3173><s%> but I am speaking <S%G3004><s%> with reference <S%G1519><s%> to Christ <S%G5547><s%> and the church. <S%G1577><s%>

Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> let each <S%G1538><s%> individual <S%G1520><s%> among you also <S%G2532><s%> love <S%G25><s%> his own <S%G1438><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> even as himself; <S%G1438><s%> and [let] the wife <S%G1135><s%> [see to it] that she respect <S%G5399><s%> her husband. <S%G435><s%>
